EXPERIENCE

  Jun 2019 - Aug 2020

JUNIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER

In this role I was in a team responsible of designing, developing, testing and maintaining features and components of a donor management web application. I worked with tools and technologies including Java Core, Java EE 8 (e.g. Jax-RS, JSF, JSP, JPA, JUnit), JBoss - WildFly, Maven, PrimeFaces, Docker, Microsoft SQL Server, Katalon Studio, Bitbucket, Intellij Idea, LucidChart, Jira and Confluence.

  Feb 2019 - May 2019

INTERN SOFTWARE ENGINEER

I worked on the development of new web application features and components and enhancement of existing features. I was also involved in the maintenance of web applications using JSF, PrimeFaces, Microsoft SQL Server, Java Core and other J2EE specifications.

  Feb 2016 - Feb 2018

DIGITAL MARKETING COORDINATOR

On this job I was responsible for the creation of Digital Marketing strategies and the content development and content management of the JHBLive online magazine and Content Bar’s MobFlashing technology.

); } } export default Experience;
